text.section:
A certificate automatically shall be null and void if:
Construction or other preparation of the site for its intended use of the facility for which the certificate was issued has not commenced within 2 years following issuance of the certificate; or
The facility has not commenced operation within 4 years following issuance of the certificate.

The Board may extend the time limits imposed under subsection (a) of this section if the certificate holder:
Applies to the Board for an extension; and
Shows good cause for allowing the extension.
